Package org.cyclops.everlastingabilities.api.capability

Class DefaultMutableAbilityStore

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.everlastingabilities.api.capability.DefaultAbilityStore
org.cyclops.everlastingabilities.api.capability.DefaultMutableAbilityStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAbilityStore, IMutableAbilityStore
public class DefaultMutableAbilityStore extends DefaultAbilityStore implements IMutableAbilityStore
Default implementation of IAbilityStore for storing abilities as a capability.
